channel.title: Comments on: Interview: Doug Dooley, Kuri Animation Designer
channel.description: Meet Kuri, the adorable home robot.

item.title: By: Chris Matthews
item.dc:creator: Chris Matthews
item.description: Hi Stephen! Kuri was a name suggested by one of our early beta-test families, and it ended up being a name we all really liked - plus, it works really well with voice commands because it's got a distinctive hard initial sound, and soft trailing sound. That way when you say "Hey Kuri" to get his attention, it works super reliably. We also kinda liked that it means Chestnut in Japanese, but that was a coincidence.
item.content:encoded: Hi Stephen! Kuri was a name suggested by one of our early beta-test families, and it ended up being a name we all really liked – plus, it works really well with voice commands because it’s got a distinctive hard initial sound, and soft trailing sound. That way when you say “Hey Kuri” to get his attention, it works super reliably. We also kinda liked that it means Chestnut in Japanese, but that was a coincidence.

item.title: By: Stephen Kuri
item.dc:creator: Stephen Kuri
item.description: Hi, I'm Stephen Kuri. As I'm sure you know Kuri is a Very unique rather rare name. I live in San Jose and am wondering how you decided to name your Robot. Regards, Stephen Kuri
item.content:encoded: Hi, I’m Stephen Kuri. As I’m sure you know Kuri is a Very unique rather rare name. I live in San Jose and am wondering how you decided to name your Robot. Regards, Stephen Kuri
